What an ASSHOLE!! I guess I'm lucky it wasn't her though because she was hella more fucked up than me; he could have taken advantage of that shit. I dunno dude, and maybe this is unfair to the male population as a whole, but do I wonder why I'm GAY?????? HELLLLLLLL NOOOOOOOOOOO! And no, it's not because of the whole "ex" thing, it just has to do with the comfort level we share and the friendship we've managed to retain after the "break". First day of school.. not bad, not bad at all. Of course, today and Thursdays consist of two art classes, so of course I'd enjoy it. There's this painting class that I'm really excited about, so we'll have to see how that goes.
